Title: Basic qualifications
desc:
1) Full of confidence in the "Beijing Modern" cause, we are willing to invest in long-term development together.
2) Has independent legal person status and valid business credentials.
3) Good business philosophy, with priority given to those who have awareness and experience in automotive brand management.
4) High-quality business conditions with a good commercial reputation.
5) With financial strength and strong financing capabilities.
6) Meeting the facility requirements for the construction of 4S stores.

Title: Recruitment process
desc:
1) The applying unit downloads the "Application Form," fills it out, binds it into a volume, and mails it to the designated address. The electronic version is then sent to the designated email address.
2) Beijing Modern will notify the applying unit of the specific site visit time at any time based on its internal progress, or invite the applying unit to Beijing for an inspection and interview.
3) After confirming the intended cooperating unit, send a selected notification for in-depth contact negotiations.
